start_dialogue: ^Ah, my favourite boy! Come, come in!
^Wow, Ma, smells amazing in here! Your famous curry, right?
^Yes, yes, of course. Made just for all of you. Come, sit down! Everything’s ready
^Ma … this curry tastes a bit funny. Did you do something different?
^Oh… does it? I… I must’ve forgotten something
^Excuse me… I… I’ll be right back
